abstract: Countrywide Financial has agreed to pay $600 million to settle shareholder lawsuits in the largest payout so far from the mortgage meltdown, The Associated Press reported.
snippet: Countrywide Financial has agreed to pay $600 million to settle shareholder lawsuits in the largest payout so far from the mortgage meltdown, The Associated Press reported.
lead_paragraph: Countrywide Financial has agreed to pay $600 million to settle shareholder lawsuits in the largest payout so far from the mortgage meltdown, The Associated Press reported.

headline.main: Countrywide to Settle Lawsuits for $600 Million
